trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Stone Mountain
There was one other sighting in Stone Mountain on or around November 5th 2001
divs: Sighting Details I was out side on the deck sitting in a rockingchair smoking a cigarette .I leaned back in the chair and looked at the sky andnoticed a strange contrail it was like a dotted line .I thought it was a jetwith some sort of engine problemso i went inside and grabbed my binoculars(busnell 7x50)when I came back out side I lokekd up at the object and could notsee a tail nor could I see any wings the object traveled in a straight line fromsw to ne was very far up and was silent. thanks jwdance
